SGI Systems, Inc. was a megacorporation headquartered on the planet Druckenwell with diverse holdings. They were also know for producing assassin droid matrixes and mission specific components for the black market. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the
Galactic Empire nationalized the company alongside Bansche Tech, Reiber Manufacturing, and Sencil Corporation. The four companies were reformed as the Imperial Droid Corporation.
